title: Ep45: Haig and the Boer War
itunes:title: Ep45: Haig and the Boer War
itunes:subtitle: In their ongoing series of episodes about Sir Douglas Haig, Peter and Gary explore his service during the Boer War. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content, visit  or...
description:
In their ongoing series of episodes about Sir Douglas Haig, Peter and Gary explore his service during the Boer War.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
